document.full_text: nhl commissioner gary bettman was talking tough wednesday, promising harsher penalties for violence next season and introducing the league's new chief disciplinarian brendan shanahan.
document.title: commissioner promises harsher penalties for head hits
lines_and_colors: nhl commissioner gary bettman was talking tough wednesday, promising harsher penalties for violence next season and introducing the league's new chief disciplinarian brendan shanahan.
